===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=さくらぎ|桜|tr1=sakura|t1=cherry, cherry tree|木|tr2=ki|t2=tree}}. The ''ki'' changes to ''gi'' due to {{rendaku|さくらぎ}}. The term ''sakura'' on its own is ambiguous, and could be used to mean either the tree or the blossom. The addition of ''ki'' ("tree") makes this distinction clear.
